title: Todo App

title: PDF Invoices
description: A script that reads invoice records from Excel files and automatically generates PDF invoices.

title: Image Scale Converter

title: The Best Company webpage
description: This project involves the creation of a professional and engaging webpage for a fictitious company.

title: Explore the cosmos: Astronomy Image of the Day
description: Dive into the wonders of the universe with our Astronomy Image of the Day feature, powered by NASA’s API. Each day, I showcase a stunning image from the cosmos, accompanied by an insightful description that unravels the beauty and science behind it. Whether you’re an astronomy enthusiast or a curious learner, our page invites you to marvel at the universe’s vastness and discover something new every day!
